statements.select: SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_events_zybl where EveresId in (select EveresId from aers_tbl_eventsresume where ExamineState=1 and EveresName='156' and HappenedDate>=#HappenedDate#)
statements.insert: INSERT INTO aers_tbl_events_zybl ( EveZyblId, EveresId, HospId, HospDepId, HappenedDate, SendtoDate, FillStaff, HospNumber, PatientExpose, ExposeTypeOne, ExposeTypeTwo, HarmDegree, FomesFrom, PharmacyState, UseDrug, UseDrugTime, StaffType, StaffTypeQt, StaffPosition, StaffEducation, StaffEduQt, StaffWorkyears, AuditFeedback, AuditStatus, Remark, IsFlag, OperatorDate, OperatorID, Other, EventLevel, TouchPatient, EventDescription, DegreeDamage, PatientExposeQt, ExposeTypeOneQt, UseDrugQt ) VALUES ( #EveZyblId#, #EveresId#, #HospId#, #HospDepId#, #HappenedDate#, #SendtoDate#, #FillStaff#, #HospNumber#, #PatientExpose#, #ExposeTypeOne#, #ExposeTypeTwo#, #HarmDegree#, #FomesFrom#, #PharmacyState#, #UseDrug#, #UseDrugTime#, #StaffType#, #StaffTypeQt#, #StaffPosition#, #StaffEducation#, #StaffEduQt#, #StaffWorkyears#, #AuditFeedback#, #AuditStatus#, #Remark#, #IsFlag#, #OperatorDate#, #OperatorID#, #Other#, #EventLevel#, #TouchPatient#, #EventDescription#, #DegreeDamage#, #PatientExposeQt#, #ExposeTypeOneQt#, #UseDrugQt# )
statements.update: UPDATE aers_tbl_events_zybl SET EveZyblId = #EveZyblId#, EveresId = #EveresId#, HospId = #HospId#, HospDepId = #HospDepId#, HappenedDate = #HappenedDate#, SendtoDate = #SendtoDate#, FillStaff = #FillStaff#, HospNumber = #HospNumber#, PatientExpose = #PatientExpose#, ExposeTypeOne = #ExposeTypeOne#, ExposeTypeTwo = #ExposeTypeTwo#, HarmDegree = #HarmDegree#, FomesFrom = #FomesFrom#, PharmacyState = #PharmacyState#, UseDrug = #UseDrug#, UseDrugTime = #UseDrugTime#, StaffType = #StaffType#, StaffTypeQt = #StaffTypeQt#, StaffPosition = #StaffPosition#, StaffEducation = #StaffEducation#, StaffEduQt = #StaffEduQt#, StaffWorkyears = #StaffWorkyears#, AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus#, Remark = #Remark#, IsFlag = #IsFlag#, OperatorDate = #OperatorDate#, OperatorID = #OperatorID#, Other=#Other#, EventLevel=#EventLevel#, TouchPatient=#TouchPatient#, EventDescription=#EventDescription#, DegreeDamage=#DegreeDamage#, PatientExposeQt=#PatientExposeQt#, ExposeTypeOneQt=#ExposeTypeOneQt#, UseDrugQt=#UseDrugQt# WHERE (EveZyblId = #EveZyblId#)
UPDATE aers_tbl_events_zybl SET AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus# WHERE (EveresId = #EveresId#)
